about_the_game:
Explore the art of Fallen: A2P Protocol while enjoying the Original Soundtrack.

This package includes the Digital Artbook where you will get more insight on how the Fallen: A2P Protocol began to come together, concept art and even bonus content that was not included in the current game. Also the Original Soundtrack has all the beautiful music that you can listen to in the game.
detailed_description:
Explore the art of Fallen: A2P Protocol while enjoying the Original Soundtrack.

This package includes the Digital Artbook where you will get more insight on how the Fallen: A2P Protocol began to come together, concept art and even bonus content that was not included in the current game. Also the Original Soundtrack has all the beautiful music that you can listen to in the game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 2.4ghz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or Radeon HD 4850 (512 MB VRAM)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9.5 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6750M 512 MB
